com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SettingStrokeChangeListener


  • public interface SettingStrokeChangeListener
    The S-Canvas based Callback Listener Interface about the Events of Stroke Setting
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBeautifyPenStyleParameterBeautifyStyleIDChanged(int styleID)
      This handler is called when the style ID (the button of the beautify pen setting) is changed.

      This handler is called when the cursive parameter of the beautify pen style is changed.

      This handler is called when the dummy parameter of the beautify pen style is changed.

      This handler is called when the modulation parameter of the beautify pen style is changed.

      This handler is called when the sustenance parameter of the beautify pen style is changed.

      • onStrokeAlphaChanged

        void onStrokeAlphaChanged(int strokeAlpha)
        This handler is called when the transparency of color is changed
        Parameters:
        strokeAlpha - transparent value of stroke color
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onStrokeStyleChanged

        void onStrokeStyleChanged(int strokeStyle)
        This handler is called when the stroke style is changed.
        Parameters:
        strokeType - Stroke style
        The stroke style can be one of following styles. SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_PENCIL, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CRAYON, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_MARKER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_DOTLINE, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_ERASER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_BEAUTIFY, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CUSTOME.
        SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_PENCIL, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_CRAYON, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_MARKER, SAMM_STROKE_STYLE_ERASER are compatible style in S Pen SDK, and other styles are for SAMM Library compatibility.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onStrokeWidthChanged

        void onStrokeWidthChanged(int strokeWidth)
        This handler is called when the stroke width is changed
        Parameters:
        strokeWidth - Stroke width
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onEraserWidthChanged

        This handler is called when the stroke width is changed
        Parameters:
        eraserWidth - Stroke width
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onClearAll

        void onClearAll(boolean bClearAllCompleted)
        This handler is called when clicking the "Clear All" button in the Eraser Settings window.
        Parameters:
        bClearAllCompleted - Whether or not "Clear All" has completed.
        (False before completed and True after completed.)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1
